description: TouchEvent feature detection APIs are available only on devices with a touchscreen at chrome startup time
extended: For what it's worth, we are using kiosk devices and the removal of this flag broke all of our client devices as well. I was however able to find a workaround to fix this by adding it as a command line flag `--touch-events=enabled`

description: ‘High Maintenance’ and the New TV Fantasy of New York - The New York Times

extended: Julia Stiles as the school newspaper’s cyberpunk editor-in-chief on a 1994 episode of ‘Ghostwriter.’ I will never get tired of this clip.
